column4: Just a question from a newbie.. I installed ubuntu for the first time a while ago but it was an old version.Trying to update I managed to brake it. Can I just pop the new version cd in and install over this one so that my files stay intact? That seems to be the easiest way
I don't think I did :& but it's not that serious
I'll try to keep an eye on making /home into it's own partition next time I install
heh you know having home on another partition saved me a few times now
